title: Church
body: In the place of this name in the parish of Quinta Grande, on the Pombal estate, there is the chapel of Santo António, ordered to be built by Father António Silvino Gonçalves de Andrade in the year 1884, of which Dr. João Francisco de Almada is the current owner.

Father António Silvino Gonçalves de Andr: Ordered the construction of the chapel of Santo António
Dr. João Francisco de Almada: Current owner of the chapel of Santo António

1884: Construction of the chapel of Santo António
